è”ç³»çš„ç´§å¯†åº¦è¶Šé«˜å†…èšæ€§è¶Šé«˜ã€‚è€¦åˆåº¦ï¼šå—é—´è”ç³»ï¼Œå„ä¸ªæ¨¡å—ä¹‹é—´è”ç³»çš„ç´§å¯†åº¦è¶Šä½Žå…¶è€¦åˆåº¦è¶Šä½Žã€‚æœ¬æ¬¡çš„æ‰“å­—æ¸¸æˆæˆ‘ä»¬å°†å…¶åˆ†æˆHtmlã€Jsã€Cssä¸‰ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚åœ¨HTMLä¸­ä»¥linkå¼•ç”¨Cssæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä»¥scriptå¼•ç”¨Jsã€‚ HtmlðŸ‘‰æ•ˆæžœå±•ç¤º1234567891011121314151617<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>æ‰“å­—æ¸¸æˆ</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="index.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="animate.css"></head><body> <h1>æ‰“&#x3000;å­—&#x3000;æ¸¸&#x3000;æˆ</h1> <main>æ¸¸æˆç”¨æ—¶ï¼š<b>00</b>s</main> <div id="start">Ready</div> <div id="char">A</div> <section>æ‚¨çš„æ­£ç¡®çŽ‡ä¸ºï¼š<span>100</span>%</section> <script src="index.js"></script></body></html> Js12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273var start = document.querySelector('#start')var times = document.querySelector('b')var main = document.querySelector('main')var char = document.querySelector('#char')var sec = document.querySelector('section')var span = document.querySelector('span')var counterStartingvar resetTime = 0var randomCharvar total = 0var right = 0start.onclick = function(){ this.className = 'bounceOutLeft animated' setTimeout(function(){ this.hidden = true }.bind(this),500) setTimeout(function(){ char.style.display = 'block' changeChar() char.className = "bounceInRight animated" },600) setTimeout(removeClass,1100) setTimeout(function(){ main.style.display = 'block' counterStarting = setInterval(counter,10) },1000) setTimeout(function(){ gameOver() },100000) char.className = 'bounceInRight animated' setTimeout(removeClass,500) window.onkeyup = function(event){ if(total >= 30){ gameOver() } else{ sec.style.display = 'block' if(randomChar === event.key.toUpperCase()){ char.className = 'bounceInRight animated' changeChar() setTimeout(removeClass,500) right++ total++ span.innerHTML = (right / total * 100).toFixed(2) } else{ char.className = 'wobble animated' setTimeout(removeClass,500) total++ span.innerHTML = (right / total * 100).toFixed(2) } } }}// åˆ‡æ¢å­—æ¯çš„å‡½æ•°function changeChar(){ var randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 26) + 65 randomChar = String.fromCharCode(randomNum) char.innerHTML = randomChar}// è®¡æ—¶å™¨å‡½æ•°function counter(){ resetTime++ times.innerHTML = resetTime / 100}function removeClass(){ char.className = ''}function gameOver(){ clearInterval(counterStarting) char.innerHTML = 'Game Over'} Css12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031body{ background-color: #FFFFFF; color: black; text-align: center; text-shadow: 0 0 50px black; -moz-user-select: entry.content: ä»£ç å®žä¾‹ï¼šðŸ‘‰æ•ˆæžœå±•ç¤º123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>3Dè½®æ’­å›¾</title> <style> main{ perspective: 900px; } section{ width: 200px; height: 100px; margin: 35vh auto; transform-style: preserve-3d; transition: all 1s; } img{ width: 200px; height: 100px; position: absolute; } img:nth-child(1){ transform: translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(2){ transform: rotateY(40deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(3){ transform: rotateY(80deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(4){ transform: rotateY(120deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(5){ transform: rotateY(160deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(6){ transform: rotateY(200deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(7){ transform: rotateY(240deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(8){ transform: rotateY(280deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(9){ transform: rotateY(320deg) translateZ(300px); } button{ width: 60px; height: 30px; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; border: 0; } div{ width: 130px; margin: 10vh auto; } </style></head><body> <main> <section> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/1.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/2.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/3.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/4.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/5.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/6.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/7.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/8.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/9.jpg" alt=""> </section> </main> <div> <button id="prev"><</button> <button id="next">></button> </div> <script> var main = document.querySelector('main') var sec = document.querySelector('section') var pre = document.getElementById('prev') var next = document.getElementById('next') var deg = 0 pre.onclick = function(){ deg = deg - 40 sec.style.transform = 'rotateY(' + deg + 'deg)' } next.onclick = function(){ deg = deg + 40 sec.style.transform = 'rotateY(' + deg + 'deg)' } </script></body></html> ç‰ˆæƒå£°æ˜Ž Forwardâ€™s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.ç”±Forward Stepåˆ›ä½œå¹¶ç»´æŠ¤çš„Forwardâ€™s Notesåšå®¢é‡‡ç”¨åˆ›ä½œå…±ç”¨ä¿ç•™ç½²å-éžå•†ä¸š-ç¦æ­¢æ¼”ç»Ž4.0å›½é™…è®¸å¯è¯ã€‚ æœ¬æ–‡é¦–å‘äºŽForwardâ€™s Notesåšå®¢ï¼ˆ http://stepforward.top ï¼‰ï¼Œç‰ˆæƒæ‰€æœ‰ï¼Œä¾µæƒå¿…ç©¶ã€‚æœ¬æ–‡æ°¸ä¹…é“¾æŽ¥ï¼šhttp://stepforward.top/2017/04/11/3Dè½®æ’­å›¾/

margin-right:12px; /*æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼šåŒè¡Œæ˜¾ç¤ºé£Žæ ¼*/ display: inline-block; } nav div a{ /*å­—ä½“å¤§å°ï¼š13px*/ font-size: 13px; /*è®¾ç½®å­—ä½“é¢œè‰²*/ color: #333333; /*å­—ä½“ç²—ç»†ï¼šç²—ä½“*/ font-weight:bold; } /*è®¾ç½®é¼ æ ‡æ‚¬æµ®çŠ¶æ€ï¼šå­—ä½“å˜è“è‰²*/ nav div a:hover{ color:blue; } nav .more-goods{ /*æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼šåŒè¡Œæ˜¾ç¤ºé£Žæ ¼*/ display: inline-block; /*å®½åº¦ï¼š64px*/ width: 64px; /*é«˜åº¦ï¼š20px*/ height: 20px; /*èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²*/ background-color:#3388FF; /*è®¾ç½®å­—ä½“å¤§å°*/ font-size: 13px; /*æ–‡æœ¬å¯¹é½ï¼šå±…ä¸­å¯¹é½*/ text-align: center; } nav .more-goods a{ color: white; } nav #list{ width: 66px; height: 100px; /*æ·»åŠ è¾¹æ¡†*/ border: 1px solid lightgray; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; line-height: 25px; /*æ·»åŠ é˜´å½±*/ box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px gray; /*æ¸¸æ ‡ï¼šæŒ‡ç¤º*/ cursor: pointer; /*ä½ç½®ï¼šç»å¯¹å®šä½*/ position: absolute; right: 60px; top: 30px; /*æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼šéšè—*/ display: none; } nav #list span{ display: inline-block; width: 14px; height: 10px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/5.png); background-position: -912px -146px; position: absolute; top: -10px; left: 26px; } nav #list div:hover{ background-color: #3388FF; color: white; } .logo{ text-align: center; } .logo img{ width: 260px; height: 120px; } form div{ width: 642px; margin: 0 auto; position: relative; } form div input{ width: 500px; height: 35px; border: 1px solid lightgray; padding-right: 40px; } form div input:focus{ border: 1px solid #3388FF; } form div button{ height: 39px; width: 93px; border: 0; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; margin-left: -5px; } footer{ text-align: center; margin-top: 30vh; font-size: 12px; color: gray; } footer .phone{ margin-top: 4px; } footer .margin-t{ margin-top: 10px; } footer a{ color: gray; } footer .margin-l a, footer .margin-t .police-margin{ margin-left: 8px; } footer .margin-t .address, footer .margin-t .police{ display: inline-block; width: 15px; height: 15px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/5.png); } footer .margin-t .address{ background-position: -600px -95px; } footer .margin-t .police{ background-position: -622px -95px; } form div span{ display: inline-block; width: 18px; height: 18px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/3.png); position: absolute; right: 110px; top: 11px; cursor: pointer; } aside{ padding-top: 22px; width: 84px; height: 923px; background-color: #F9F9F9; position: absolute; right: 0px; top: 0; font-size: 13px; text-align: center; display: none; } aside .light-box{ cursor: pointer; width: 76%; margin: 0 auto; } aside .light-box>div{ padding: 8px 0; border-top: 1px solid lightgray; } aside .light-box>div:first-child{ margin-top: 12px; } aside .light-box>div:last-child{ border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray; margin-bottom: 12px; } aside a{ font-size: 13px; color: gray; } aside .light-box .music, aside .light-box .image, aside .light-box .know, aside .light-box .book, aside .light-box .wind{ display: inline-block; width: 36px; height: 36px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/1.png); } aside .light-box .music{ width: 42px; background-position: -72px 0; } aside .light-box .image{ background-position: -113px 0; } aside .light-box .know{ background-position: -36px 0; } aside .light-box .book{ background-position: -149px 0; } aside .light-box .wind{ background-position: -185px 0; } main{ display: none; } main .modal{ width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: black; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; opacity: 0.5; } main .form-box{ width: 393px; height: 448px; background-color: white; position: absolute; top: calc((100% - 448px)/2); left: calc((100% - 393px)/2); } main .form-box h3{ background-color: #F7F7F7; margin: 0; padding: 10px 20px; } main .form-box h3 .baidu-logo{ width: 25px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/7.png); vertical-align: bottom; } main .form-box h3 #close{ color: #3388FF; display: inline-block; border: 1px solid #3388FF; border-radius: 50%; padding: 1px 5px 1px 5px; position: absolute; right: 20px; font-size: 15px; top: 15px; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box h3 #close:hover{ color: red; border-color: red; } main .form-box .message-signin{ font-size: 12px; text-align: right; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .message-signin span:nth-child(1){ display: inline-block; width: 9px; height: 15px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/6.png); vertical-align: middle; } main .form-box .message-signin span:nth-child(2):hover{ color:#3388FF; text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box .container .first-input{ position: relative; margin-bottom: 20px; } main .form-box .container .first-input input{ width: calc(99% - 31px); height: 40px; border: 1px solid lightgray; padding-left: 31px; } main .form-box .container .first-input span{ display: inline-block; width: 25px; height: 25px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/8.png); position: absolute; top: 9px; left: 3px; } main .form-box .container .one span{ background-position: 0 -69px; } main .form-box .container .two span{ background-position: 0 -148px; } main .form-box .container .first-input input:focus{ border-color: #3388FF; } main .form-box .container .next-signin{ font-size: 12px; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .container .next-signin span{ float: right; color: #3388FF; } main .form-box .container .next-signin span:hover, main .form-box .container .register-now span:hover, .reverse-face span:hover{ text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box .container .next-signin input{ vertical-align: -2px; } main .form-box .container .submit-button input{ width: 100%; height: 38px; border: 0; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; } main .form-box .container .register-now{ text-align: right; font-size: 12px; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .container .register-now span{ color: #3388FF; } hr{ width: 113.75%; border-top: 0; margin-left: -23px; } main .form-box .container .other-signin{ font-size: 12px; } main .form-box .container .other-signin span, #toggle-modal{ display: inline-block; width: 25px; height: 25px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/9.png); } main #toggle-modal{ position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 40px; height: 40px; background-position: -46px -90px; } .reverse-face{ text-align: center; margin-top: 10vh; display: none; }
